newsitem.title: ESTONIA: BOURSE TO DECIDE ON RAKVERE TRADE.
newsitem.headline: BOURSE TO DECIDE ON RAKVERE TRADE.

text.p: The Tallinn stock exchange will make a decision on restarting trade in Rakvere meat factory shares on the morning of June 19 before the bourse opens, officials said on Wednesday.
"I believe the decision will be made by 9.30," managing director Helo Meigas told Reuters.
Rakvere shares were suspended in the second hour of trade on Wednesday after the securities commission asked the police to investigate a possible insider trading case.
